member.name: T:SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange
member.summary: Represents a double range with minimum and maximum values.

remarks.para: The class represents a double range with inclusive limits - both minimum and maximum values of the range are included into it. Mathematical notation of such range is [min, max].

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange.IsInside(System.Double)
member.summary: Check if the specified value is inside of the range.
member.returns: True if the specified value is inside of the range or false otherwise.

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange.IsInside(SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange)
member.summary: Check if the specified range is inside of the range.
member.returns: True if the specified range is inside of the range or false otherwise.

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange.IsOverlapping(SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange)
member.summary: Check if the specified range overlaps with the range.
member.returns: True if the specified range overlaps with the range or false otherwise.

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange.ToIntRange(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Convert the signle precision range to integer range.
member.param: Specifies if inner integer range must be returned or outer range.
member.returns: Returns integer version of the range.
member.remarks: If is set to , then the returned integer range will always fit inside of the current single precision range. If it is set to , then current single precision range will always fit into the returned integer range.

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange.op_Equality(SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange,SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange)
member.summary: Equality operator - checks if two ranges have equal min/max values.
member.returns: Returns if min/max values of specified ranges are equal.

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange.op_Inequality(SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange,SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange)
member.summary: Inequality operator - checks if two ranges have different min/max values.
member.returns: Returns if min/max values of specified ranges are not equal.

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Check if this instance of equal to the specified one.
member.param: Another range to check equalty to.
member.returns: Return if objects are equal.

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange.GetHashCode
member.summary: Get hash code for this instance.
member.returns: Returns the hash code for this instance.

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange.ToString
member.summary: Get string representation of the class.
member.returns: Returns string, which contains min/max values of the range in readable form.

member.name: P:SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange.Min
member.summary: Minimum value of the range.

remarks.para: The property represents minimum value (left side limit) or the range - [min, max].

member.name: P:SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange.Max
member.summary: Maximum value of the range.

remarks.para: The property represents maximum value (right side limit) or the range - [min, max].

member.name: P:SH3H.SharpFrame.DoubleRange.Length
member.summary: Length of the range (deffirence between maximum and minimum values).

member.name: T:SH3H.SharpFrame.IntRange
member.summary: Represents an integer range with minimum and maximum values.

remarks.para: The class represents an integer range with inclusive limits - both minimum and maximum values of the range are included into it. Mathematical notation of such range is [min, max].

member.summary: Implicit conversion to .
member.param: Integer range to convert to single precision range.

member.name: T:SH3H.SharpFrame.Encryption.Shift
member.summary: Extensions that deal with bit xoring

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.Encryption.Shift.Encrypt(System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Encrypts the data using a basic xor of the key (not very secure unless doing a one time pad)
member.param: Is this a one time pad?
member.returns: The encrypted data

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.Encryption.Shift.Encrypt(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Encrypts the data using a basic xor of the key (not very secure unless doing a one time pad)
member.param: Is this a one time pad?
Encoding that the Data uses (defaults to UTF8)
member.returns: The encrypted data

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.Encryption.Shift.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Decrypts the data using a basic xor of the key (not very secure unless doing a one time pad)
member.param: Is this a one time pad?
member.returns: The decrypted data

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.Encryption.Shift.Decrypt(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Decrypts the data using a basic xor of the key (not very secure unless doing a one time pad)
member.param: Is this a one time pad?
Encoding that the Data uses (defaults to UTF8)
member.returns: The encrypted data

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.Encryption.Shift.Process(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Actually does the encryption/decryption

member.name: T:SH3H.SharpFrame.Encryption.SymmetricEncryption
member.summary: Symmetric key extensions

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.Encryption.SymmetricEncryption.Encrypt(System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding,System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encrypts a string
member.param: Algorithm to use for encryption (defaults to AES)
Can be either SHA1 or MD5
Needs to be 16 ASCII characters long
Can be 64 (DES only), 128 (AES), 192 (AES and Triple DES), or 256 (AES)
Encoding that the original string is using (defaults to UTF8)
member.returns: An encrypted string (Base 64 string)

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.Encryption.SymmetricEncryption.Encrypt(System.Byte[],System.String,System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encrypts a byte array
member.param: Algorithm to use for encryption (defaults to AES)
Can be either SHA1 or MD5
Needs to be 16 ASCII characters long
Can be 64 (DES only), 128 (AES), 192 (AES and Triple DES), or 256 (AES)
member.returns: An encrypted byte array

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.Encryption.SymmetricEncryption.Decrypt(System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding,System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decrypts a string
member.param: Encoding that the output string should use (defaults to UTF8)
Algorithm to use for decryption (defaults to AES)
Can be either SHA1 or MD5
Needs to be 16 ASCII characters long
Can be 64 (DES only), 128 (AES), 192 (AES and Triple DES), or 256 (AES)
member.returns: A decrypted string

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.Encryption.SymmetricEncryption.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.String,System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decrypts a byte array
member.param: Can be either SHA1 or MD5
Needs to be 16 ASCII characters long
Can be 64 (DES only), 128 (AES), 192 (AES and Triple DES), or 256 (AES)
member.returns: A decrypted byte array

member.name: T:SH3H.SharpFrame.Encryption.RSAEncryption
member.summary: Utility class for doing RSA Encryption

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.Encryption.RSAEncryption.Encrypt(System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Encrypts a string using RSA
member.param: Input string (should be small as anything over 128 bytes can not be decrypted)
Encoding that the input string uses (defaults to UTF8)
member.returns: An encrypted string (64bit string)

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.Encryption.RSAEncryption.Decrypt(System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Decrypts a string using RSA
member.param: Input string (should be small as anything over 128 bytes can not be decrypted)
Encoding that the result should use (defaults to UTF8)
member.returns: A decrypted string

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.Encryption.RSAEncryption.CreateKey(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new set of keys
member.param: True if private key should be included, false otherwise
member.returns: XML representation of the key information

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.Encryption.RSAEncryption.SignHash(System.String,System.String,System.String@,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Takes a string and creates a signed hash of it
member.param: This will be filled with the unsigned hash
Encoding that the input is using (defaults to UTF8)
member.returns: A signed hash of the input (64bit string)

member.name: M:SH3H.SharpFrame.Encryption.RSAEncryption.VerifyHash(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies a signed hash against the unsigned version
member.param: The key to use in decryption
member.returns: True if it is verified, false otherwise
